alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 4:44PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Lauderdale, northwestern Limestone, eastern Colbert and north central Lawrence Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 443 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rogersville, or 16 miles east of Muscle Shoals, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rogersville, Lexington, Anderson, Lester, Good Springs, Oliver, Mt Rozell, Center Star, Kingtown and Whitehead. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
